name: Portal Breach
description:
A small action game created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. All of the game assets were created by my kids (Dylan and Rhiannon). This gave me an excuse to take a game a project made in Godot (which I'm still learning) from concept to published HTML 5 release.

WASD or Arrow keys to move. SPACE to shoot. Your gun can overheat (indicated by a red bar at the bottom and the audio). Kill the monsters and shoot the portal.

ESCAPE or Q will work in the native versions (to be added later), but do not work in the HTML version.

I think it has a 90's old-school amature flash game kind of feel to it. :)
